# Zuplo Examples

> API gateway examples demonstrating Zuplo features including rate limiting, caching, authentication, MCP servers, and custom policies.

## Quick Start

Each example can be run locally:
```bash
cd {example-name}
npm install
npm run dev
```

Or create a fresh copy:
```bash
npx create-zuplo-api@latest --example {example-name}
```

## Documentation

- [Zuplo Docs](https://zuplo.com/docs): Official documentation
- [Policies Reference](https://zuplo.com/docs/policies): All available policies
- [MCP Server Docs](https://zuplo.com/docs/mcp-server/introduction): Model Context Protocol

## Examples by Category

### MCP Servers
- [mcp-server-custom-tools](./mcp-server-custom-tools/): MCP Server with custom tools orchestrating multiple API calls
- [mcp-server-graphql](./mcp-server-graphql/): Expose GraphQL APIs as an MCP Server with introspection
- [mcp-server-openai-apps-sdk](./mcp-server-openai-apps-sdk/): ChatGPT App using MCP Server and OpenAI Apps SDK
- [mcp-server-prompts](./mcp-server-prompts/): MCP Server with additional prompts for enhanced UX
- [remote-mcp-server](./remote-mcp-server/): Remote MCP server with authentication and security policies
- [remote-mcp-server-with-oauth](./remote-mcp-server-with-oauth/): Remote MCP Server with OAuth authentication via Auth0

### Caching
- [semantic-caching](./semantic-caching/): Cache responses based on semantic similarity
- [idempotency-keys](./idempotency-keys/): Prevent duplicate requests with idempotency keys

### Authentication & Authorization
- [bff-auth](./bff-auth/): Backend-for-frontend authentication pattern
- [dev-portal-with-api-keys](./dev-portal-with-api-keys/): Self-serve API key portal for developers
- [openfga](./openfga/): OpenFGA fine-grained authorization
- [upstream-jwt-auth](./upstream-jwt-auth/): JWT authentication for upstream services

### Rate Limiting
- [custom-429-response](./custom-429-response/): Customize rate limit responses
- [dynamic-rate-limits](./dynamic-rate-limits/): Customer-tier based dynamic rate limits

### Programmability
- [custom-module](./custom-module/): Bundle custom node modules in your Zuplo project
- [log-request-response](./log-request-response/): Capture full request and response for logging
- [rewrite-request-body](./rewrite-request-body/): Modify request body with custom policies
- [route-custom-data](./route-custom-data/): Use custom OpenAPI data in policies and handlers
- [oas-base-path](./oas-base-path/): Custom base path and forwarding server configuration

### Validation & Governance
- [api-linting](./api-linting/): Enforce API consistency with linting rules
- [schema-validation-file-ref](./schema-validation-file-ref/): Request validation with external schema files

### Testing
- [test-mocks](./test-mocks/): Unit testing with mocked Zuplo objects

### Other Examples
- [ab-test-backend](./ab-test-backend/): A/B testing backend implementation
- [api-key-creation](./api-key-creation/): Programmatic API key creation
- [metered-monetization](./metered-monetization/): Usage-based API monetization
- [proxy-firestore-admin](./proxy-firestore-admin/): Proxy to Firestore with admin credentials
- [proxy-firestore-user](./proxy-firestore-user/): Proxy to Firestore with user credentials
